text: The list of Honorary Doctors of the University of Otago below shows the recipients of honorary doctorates bestowed by the University of Otago since 1962. Prior to this date honoris causa were conferred by the University of New Zealand, see List of Honorary Doctors of the University of New Zealand. {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year ! Recipient !
